p: Lihir sera (55 in total) were collected from patients presenting to the outpatient clinic of Lihir rural health centre from May through November 2010 during pre-employment medical visits, at antenatal screening visits, or from patients presenting for a range of conditions including joint pain, diabetes and fever. The sera were also assessed for DENV genomes (11/55 sera from febrile patients) and for anti-DENV NAb (44/55 sea from patients with non-febrile conditions).
